pr_title: Add shortcut to create new source column

timeline.message: add CTRL+F7 shorcut to add new source column

timeline.bodyText: For easier discovery, recommend adding the command to the (increasingly crowded) View menu, probably under the Pane submenu.
timeline.author: gtritchie
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1497,7 +1499,12 @@ well as menu structures (for main menu and popup menus).
         label="Show All Panes"
         menuLabel="_Show All Panes"
         windowMode="main"/>
-        
+
+   <cmd id="newSourceColumn"

replies.bodyText: It is added to the View menu unless I'm misunderstanding:
replies.author: melissa-barca

replies.bodyText: Oops, my bad, sorry. Missed that.
replies.author: gtritchie

timeline.bodyText:
Should we show an alert if command is invoked and there are already MAX_COLUMN_COUNT columns?
Or, could instead disable the command when there are that many columns, and it will thus be disabled in the menu and the command-palette. Might be simpler just to keep enabled and show an alert.
timeline.author: gtritchie

replies.bodyText: Ok, I updated to show an alert when MAX_COLUMN_COUNTS is reached and when the Allow Source Columns pref is set to false.
replies.author: melissa-barca
